page.syntax: Shortened_Filename as C = a5_shorten_fn(C filename [,N length ])

argument.name: Shortened_Filename
argument.description: A shortened version of the a filename with "..." substituted for elements of the path.

argument.name: filename
argument.description: The original filename with full path information.

argument.name: length
argument.description: Numeric. Optional. Default = 30. The maximum number of characters to return.

page.discussion: The A5_SHORTEN_FN() function shortens a filename to the specified number of characters by truncating the path and inserting "...". The default length is 30. The minimum returned will be the filename itself with all path information removed.
